episode: I lost a lot of money in the stock market last week. This made me very terrified of the stock market.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I lost a lot of money in the stock market last week. This made me very terrified of the stock market.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really tough. Did you take a big risk or was it an unexpected downturn?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was an unexpected downturn

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Market volatility can be really unsettling.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Now I am afraid to go back in

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fear of loss is normal, but don't let it paralyze you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is tough not being afraind

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's okay to be cautious, but don't let fear hold you back.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just hope the market does not have any more big swings for the rest of the year

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Stability would be a welcome relief right now.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: it sure will. Now I have to grind out the rest of the year

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Hang in there, you'll get through it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope. but I will take over a year to get my money back.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a long road to recovery, stay patient.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will try but it gets so tiresome when I have to keep my head above the water

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can feel suffocating, but keep pushing forward.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will try to keep strong.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're stronger than you think, keep going.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope so. Man, I should have know better

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Don't beat yourself up, hindsight is 20/20.
